dmca.title: Alpine Asks Google to Remove Linked Images
dmca.body:
May 3, 2004

Google, Inc,
Attn: User Support, DMCA complaints
[private]
Mountain View, CA 94043

	Re: Unauthorized Use of Intellectual Property

Dear Google, Inc.:

1.	The copyrighted work at issue is the material that appears on
[http://images.google.com/images?q=alpine&ie=UTF-8&oe=UTF-8&hl=en]:

2.
Search Query: alpine
Infringing web pages:
(I) Using copy written Images:
http://www.theautochannel.com/content/cybercast/carclinic/ces/2002/nav.html
http://caraudiosecurity.com/catalog/product_info.php+products_id+378
www.tiburonturbo.com/other/alpine-amp.gif
http://www.audio-car.com/Productos/Alpine/ImatgesAlpine/SPR-174Aa.jpg
http://www.audio-car.com/Productos/Alpine/ImatgesAlpine/SPS-4629Pa.jpg
www.adelcom.net/ALPINE-sec-100s-Page.htm

KEY:

(I) Using copy written Images
(P) In violation of Patent
(M) In violation of Trademark
(L) Using web address or links to the specified client's websites
(N) Item not an item of the client
(T) Using copy written Text
(U) Posing as an Authorized Dealer
(W) Claiming a Valid Manufacturer's warranty

	I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

	If you have questions, please contact Net Enforcers via facsimile to xxx-xxx-xxxx, or via email to [private]@[private].com. Net Enforcers is authorized to handle and resolve this matter with you and has already been involved with this case. Calls directly to [Alpine] will not be accepted.

	I swear, under penalty of perjury consistent with United States Code Title 17, Section 512, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

I may be contacted at:

Printed Name: [ [private] ]
Title & Company: [Enforcement Team, Net Enforcers, Inc.]
Street Address: [[private]]
City and State: [Coral Springs, FL]
Zip: [[private]]
Email (ended auction inquiries)*: [[private]@[private].com]
Fax: [xxx.xxx.xxxx]

Signed:

[private]
